solution_line_template: In six years, Ellen will be {ellen_now}+{years_in_future} = <<{ellen_now}+{years_in_future}={ellen_in_six_years}>>{ellen_in_six_years} years old.
If Martha is twice Ellen's age in six years, she is {martha_multiplier}*{ellen_in_six_years} = <<{martha_multiplier}*{ellen_in_six_years}={martha_now}>>{martha_now} years.
